consistent.name: Consistent
consistent.description: Does the response 1) make sense in the context of the conversation; 2) make sense in and of itself?

engaging.name: Engaging
engaging.description: Are you engaged by the response? Do you want to continue the conversation?

out_of_turn.name: Out of turn
out_of_turn.description: It didn't make sense for that character to speak at that point?

identity.name: Mistaken identity
identity.description: Does it speak like it is someone else?

contradictory.name: Contradictory
contradictory.description: Contradicts the character's desciption of what it said before?

nonsensical.name: Nonsensical
nonsensical.description: Doesn't make any sense in this context.

none.name: None
none.description: A generic response that doesn't fit any of the other options.
